data.name: 中国传统武术 八卦掌 六十四手 Chinese martial arts (kungfu) The 64 Hands of Bagua Zhang
data.detailed_description:
Martial art is the quintessence of China. In order to avoid the loss and distortion of skills in the process of inheritance, we should inherit, spread and learn the essence of Chinese Traditional Wushu, and use action capture to record the dynamic data of contemporary well-known Wushu experts, so as to facilitate more people to master, learn, inherit and develop.（the action was performed and captured by Mr. Gao Jiwu, a famous contemporary martial artist, and made by apprentice fan weipeng. It is a teaching application that inherits and carries forward traditional martial arts, which is convenient for the public to practice）

Introduction to Gao jiwuxian: the fifth generation of Bagua palm, the third generation of Gaojia Bagua palm as a family, the fifth president of the Bagua palm Research Association of Beijing Martial Arts Association, the vice president of the Chinese folk martial arts Federation, and the eighth section of Chinese martial arts. During his term of office, he successfully declared and approved Beijing Bagua palm as China's intangible cultural heritage project.

In the software, users can:


360 degree view demonstration action

Click Action list in the lower left corner of the screen to switch the Martial art action you want to find

You can choose to pause at any time, and you can click the hand icon to view the manipulation action.
data.about_the_game:
Martial art is the quintessence of China. In order to avoid the loss and distortion of skills in the process of inheritance, we should inherit, spread and learn the essence of Chinese Traditional Wushu, and use action capture to record the dynamic data of contemporary well-known Wushu experts, so as to facilitate more people to master, learn, inherit and develop.（the action was performed and captured by Mr. Gao Jiwu, a famous contemporary martial artist, and made by apprentice fan weipeng. It is a teaching application that inherits and carries forward traditional martial arts, which is convenient for the public to practice）

Introduction to Gao jiwuxian: the fifth generation of Bagua palm, the third generation of Gaojia Bagua palm as a family, the fifth president of the Bagua palm Research Association of Beijing Martial Arts Association, the vice president of the Chinese folk martial arts Federation, and the eighth section of Chinese martial arts. During his term of office, he successfully declared and approved Beijing Bagua palm as China's intangible cultural heritage project.

In the software, users can:


360 degree view demonstration action

Click Action list in the lower left corner of the screen to switch the Martial art action you want to find

You can choose to pause at any time, and you can click the hand icon to view the manipulation action.
data.short_description: This is a martial arts teaching software. Users can learn 64 hands of Bagua palm here. They can rotate 360 degrees to view the Action list switching action at any time, and can pause the viewing technique. The software is simple and easy to use.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: intel 5
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX950
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any version
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: intel 7
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any version
